name: G2 TEAM Interactive
tagline: We specializes in web design and backend-developme
description:
G2 TEAM Interactive Agency has been established since 2010 with HQ in Szczecin. Our 2 external departments are located in Berlin and Poznań. 
 
 
 
 
We specializes in web design and backend-development. G2 TEAM Interactive Agency supplies integrated services from the area of e-marketing as well as offers professional branding services. Our team consists of experienced professionals who bring years of experience in areas of information technology, web development, graphic design, SEO-technics and economy.
 
 
 
 
 
 
We implement modern and mobile-friendly websites and portals. Our IT unit specializes in many different technologies such as WordPress, Laravel, Yii Framework, JavaScript.
 
 
 
 
We offer software development outsourcing for startups!
